Text: News About Your k Wizard SubscriptionDear Kevin Hyatt Over the past few months K Wizard has been working on a new faster easier to use subscriptionbased site which will be rolled out on September The new site will deliver Unlimited Usage search and download any and all SEC documents and attachments No limits o n the number of downloaded documents no additional charges Unsurpassed Speed and Reliability K Wizard posts SEC Filings in realtime fully i ndexed and ready to search Unique Personal Alerting Use the Alert Wiz ard to set up and send crucial information to your Email You can be alerte d not only on company symbols but full text as well For example you can set up an alert to notify you when the words Warren Buffett appear in an y Insider Trading form Streamlined Document Downloads dont struggle with cut and paste K Wizard automatically converts all text and HTML do cuments into MSWord compatible documents for storage on your computer Full Text Indexing and Searching provides you with the most robust search capability and comprehensive results available in the market today As a current user of K Wizard you can register today to receive the special introductory rate of per year and fix your subscription rate for the second year Thats equivalent to six months of FREE access over the next two years This introductory special will be offered only for a limited ti me We accept most major credit cards Click on the link below to subscrib e gDbcfded Need access for groups or enterprisewide accessibility Click on the link below for information on Enterprise Accounts typeD ent Are you a journalist Click on the link below for information on Jour nalist Accounts typeDjou From all of u s at K Wizard we hope you enjoy the new version and thank you for your c ontinued support We look forward to serving you in the months to come K Wizard Team

News About Your k Wizard SubscriptionDear Kevin Hyatt For those of you who have been comparing SEC filing services weve been busy in the last eight weeks adding new features most requested from our users New Client Tracking and Reporting Option Helpful for those who need to monitor time and activities for rebilling New Online Group Enrollment and Invoicing Option Its easier than ever to setup a corporate account with two or more people New Private Domains and Group Administrative Tools Gives more control and customized access to large groups New No Advertising on K Wizard no annoying banner ads to intrude on your search activities Real time SEC Filings No embargoes SEC filings are posted as soon as they are filed with the SEC Unlimited Usage Search and download SEC EDGAR documents and attachments No limits on the number of downloaded documents no additional charges Full Text Searching K Wizard provides you with the ability to search the full text of the documents including the metadata with keywords or use advanced Boolean operators to retrieve documents with specific language Each hit is highlighted within the documents for easier recognition Multiparameter Searching Searching by ticker or company name or industry or SIC and full text search and by form group or a specific form and by date range Unlimited Personal Alerts Use the K Wizard to set up an unlimited number of alerts Send time sensitive alerts on new SEC filings to your Email You can be alerted not only on company symbols but full text searches as well For example you can set up an alert to notify you when the words Warren Buffett appear in any Insider Trading form RTF Rich Text Format Document Downloads K Wizard converts all text and HTML documents into MSWord compatible documents for storage on your computer Download Tables as Excel Spreadsheets Manipulate the data compare companys financials graph or chart data There is still time to take advantage of our introductory subscription rate of per year and lock in that rate for your renewal in This special offer will expire soon so act now Or you may choose to subscribe monthly at per month or per quarter The new online billing feature also accepts all major credit cards providing instant access to the service Visit us at If you have six or more people needing access to K Wizard you should take advantage of our group discount rates To contact us call or send email to From all of us at K Wizard we hope you enjoy the new version We look forward to serving you in the months to come K Wizard Team
